name: Penduline Village
storyline:
You arrive at your new home, on your very own floating island, where you are greeted by Cass.

She lives in the neighbouring village, whose inhabitants have always been protected by their protected by their appointed wizard. So you've come to replace your predecessor, who … but that's another story. Cass advises you to go and speak to the villagers, some of whom need help. You could even make yourself appreciated by contributing to the life village life.

To carry out the various quests presented to you, you can plant and harvest the island's natural resources, before using them to to cook and brew potions. Who knows what properties these beverages hold? You can also trade items with some of the island's inhabitants, to resources that are harder to find elsewhere. Finally, it's rumoured that a magical portal is hidden in the forest and watched over closely by a guardian.

It's certainly not what you imagined you'd experience when you moved to Penduline Village!
summary: Penduline Village allows you to impersonate a witch moving in on her own island. She can then use her ability to cook and brew potions in order to help the villagers with the quests they offer, and get appreciated in the village.
